summary: This is an email chain from August 1, 2019, forwarding a confidential communication from an attorney representing two anonymous women who allege they were fraudulently recruited, enticed to Epstein's New York residence in June 2004 for a paid massage, and then forcefully sexually assaulted by Jeffrey Epstein. The attorney requests the victims' anonymity be protected.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The individual accused of fraudulently recruiting and forcefully sexually assaulting the two anonymous women at his New York residence in or around June 2004.

events.title: Alleged Sexual Assaults at Epstein's NY Residence
events.description: Two women allege they were fraudulently recruited and enticed to perform a massage on Jeffrey Epstein at his New York residence, resulting in Epstein forcefully sexually assaulting them. They are also concerned sexually explicit pictures were unknowingly taken of them.

events.title: Attorney Submits Confidential Victim Reports
events.description: An attorney forwards a confidential communication to an unspecified recipient, reporting allegations from two anonymous clients against Jeffrey Epstein and requesting protection of their identities.

keyFacts: An attorney represents two anonymous women alleging Jeffrey Epstein fraudulently recruited and sexually assaulted them in or around June 2004.
The alleged assaults occurred at Epstein's private residence at 9 East 71st St., New York, NY.
The victims were reportedly recruited for a paid 'personal massage' that resulted in forceful sexual assault.
The victims are concerned that sexually explicit pictures were unknowingly taken of them during the incidents.
The attorney strongly requests the victims' identities remain confidential and not be released to the public or Epstein's legal team.
